name: Save JDBC
description: This node writes data to databases using JDBC.

fields.name: url
fields.title: URL
fields.description: The JDBC URL to connect to

fields.name: table
fields.title: DB Table
fields.description: The JDBC table to write to

fields.name: driver
fields.title: Driver
fields.description: The class name of the JDBC driver needed to connect to the URL

fields.name: user
fields.title: User
fields.description: Username with which to connect to the DB

fields.name: password
fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password with which to connect to the DB

fields.name: saveMode
fields.title: Save Mode
fields.description: Whether to Append, Overwrite or Error if the table Exists
